explains: v. 同情，体谅；赞同，支持
wordGroup: sympathize with 同情…；与…产生共鸣

sentences.en: I find it very hard to sympathize with him.
I must tell you how much I sympathize with you for your loss, Professor.
sentences.cn: 教授，我必须告诉您我对您所受的损失深表同情。

sentences.en: I heartily sympathize with you.; I have every sympathy for you.
